attributes.action: Permanently ban the practice of Short Selling by Banks and Stock Brokers as soon as possible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Short Selling is the practice of selling shares that one does not own in anticipation that doing so will depress the price of that stock. Later in the settlement period one buys an identical amount of the stock at a lower price thus settling one's account with a profit. 
This practice has no legitimate objective but is undertaken by "reputable" Merchant Banks as well as rogue traders. THIS IS URGENT
